articles.title: Why a historian thinks US Jews are living through a ‘high tide’ of antisemitism
articles.description: Pamela Nadell's new book, 'Antisemitism, an American Tradition,' chronicles Jew-hatred since colonial times, and asks whether the postwar years were as 'golden' as they seemed The post Why a historian thinks US Jews are living through a ‘high tide’ of antisemitism appeared first on The Times of Israel .
